org.greatage.ioc.cache
Interface Cache<K,V>

Type Parameters:
K - type of cache keys
V - type of cache items
All Known Implementing Classes:
EhcacheCache, JCache, OSCache, SimpleCache
public interface Cache<K,V>

This interface represents cache that provides simplified access to all cache operations.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Ivan Khalopik

Method Summary
 void clear()
          Clears cache.
 boolean contains(K key)
          Checks if this cache instance contains item with specified key.
 V get(K key)
          Gets cached item by its key.
 java.lang.String getName()
          Gets cache name.
 void put(K key, V value)
          Puts item to cache.
 V remove(K key)
          Removes cached item by its key.
 

Method Detail

getName

java.lang.String getName()
Gets cache name.

Returns:
cache name

contains

boolean contains(K key)
Checks if this cache instance contains item with specified key.

Parameters:
key - item key
Returns:
true it this cache instance contains item with specified key, false otherwise

get

V get(K key)
Gets cached item by its key.

Parameters:
key - cache item key
Returns:
cached item or null if not exists

put

void put(K key,
         V value)
Puts item to cache.

Parameters:
key - item key
value - item instance

remove

V remove(K key)
Removes cached item by its key.

Parameters:
key - cached item key
Returns:
removed item instance or null if not exists

clear

void clear()
Clears cache. All cached items will be removed from it.
